name: Black Hole: The Cosmic Vacuum Cleaner
name_original: Black Hole: The Cosmic Vacuum Cleaner
description:
Mini Jam 98: Theme Empty with Limitation Roguelike submission.

Eat small planets to grow.  Avoid being eaten by the enemy black hold, until you get can to 100, then you can eat the black hole and win!  See how fast you can do it.

The first thing that came to mind with the theme "Empty" was a world that would be sucked into nothingness by a black hole.

The game is a Roguelike in that the level is procedurally generated, and there is permadeath.

Made in Godot Engine

Instructions:

Mouse to navigate and move around

Space to start the game

R to restart

ESC to quit

Art and SFX taken from OpenGameArt.org
